long_description: The women's Oakley A-Frame snow goggles feature a versatile copper lens to deliver great contrast and depth perception in variable conditions, ensuring clear definition as you ride. VR28 lens has a copper tint with 28% visible light transmission (VLT), improving contrast and depth perception in a wide variety of conditions. Spherical lens tapers from the optical center toward the periphery for a wide field of vision with minimal distortion. Antifog treatment along with frame and lens venting combat lens fogging, delivering clear vision in changing weather. 3-layer face foam is constructed of a dense base, a plush mid layer and a soft fleece top layer; design ensures a tight seal, good moisture management and maximum comfort. Durable frame is made of a conforming, flexibile plastic to ensure a comfortable fit all day long and in changing temperatures. Strap outriggers hinge to create a flush fit that minimizes gaps and distributes pressure evenly across your face. The helmet-compatible design of the women's Oakley A-Frame snow goggles fits small- to medium-size faces.
short_description: The women's Oakley A-Frame snow goggles feature a versatile copper lens to deliver great contrast and depth perception in variable conditions, ensuring clear definition as you ride.
